name: Teensy Watch Games Pack7: 2-in-1
description:
Two simple yet challenging games for apple watch.
Teensy watch games pack7 includes following two games.

On Letter Guess
In this fast paced game you quickly guess the right item that starts with given letter. Guess as many item as you can to score the highest points.

Instant Match
This game test your matching skill.Quickly tap the item that matches with given word.

Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at teensystudios@gmail.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist.
